articles.title: Breaking ranks with EU, Hungary says ready to pay for Russian gas in roubles - Reuters.com
articles.description: Hungary said on Wednesday it was prepared to pay roubles for Russian gas, breaking ranks with the European Union which has sought a united front in opposing Moscow's demand for payment in the currency.
